name: Veg Pizza
description: A delicious and flavorful pizza topped with an assortment of fresh and vibrant vegetables.

name: Veg Cheese Pizza
description: A delectable combination of gooey melted cheese and assorted fresh vegetables atop a crispy pizza crust.

name: Nachos Pizza
description: A fusion of crunchy nacho chips and savory pizza flavors, creating a unique and satisfying culinary experience.

name: Cream Onion Pizza
description: A delectable pizza adorned with creamy richness and the sweet tanginess of caramelized onions.

name: Tomato Pizza
description: A classic pizza featuring the bold and vibrant taste of ripe tomatoes combined with delightful toppings.

name: Schezwan Pizza
description: An enticing fusion of spicy Schezwan flavors and the savory delight of pizza, creating a tantalizing culinary fusion.

name: Meggie Pizza
description: A creative twist on pizza, combining the beloved taste of Maggi noodles with cheesy goodness on a crust.

name: Cheese Corn Pizza
description: A scrumptious pizza adorned with a harmonious blend of creamy cheese and golden kernels of corn.

name: Cheese Paneer Pizza
description: A delectable fusion of smooth paneer and gooey cheese atop a delectable pizza crust.

name: Paneer Tikka Pizza
description: A flavorful medley of aromatic paneer tikka and savory pizza, offering a delightful culinary experience.

name: Veg Sandwich
description: A delectable combination of fresh vegetables tucked between slices of bread, creating a delightful and nutritious sandwich.

name: Nutella Sandwich
description: A delectable treat featuring creamy Nutella spread between slices of bread, delivering a sweet and satisfying sandwich.

name: Veg Cheese Sandwich
description: A scrumptious blend of melted cheese and crisp vegetables nestled between slices of bread, crafting a mouthwatering veg cheese sandwich.

name: Masala Sandwich
description: A flavorful delight, packed with aromatic spices and vegetables, transforming into a delectable masala sandwich.

name: Corn Sandwich
description: A delectable creation featuring golden kernels of corn nestled between slices of bread, forming a delightful corn sandwich.

name: Schezwan Sandwich
description: A zesty fusion of Szechuan flavors and delightful ingredients, resulting in a tantalizing Schezwan sandwich.

name: Bruschetta Sandwich
description: A delicious medley of fresh tomatoes, basil, and seasonings atop toasted bread, crafting a delightful bruschetta sandwich.

name: Masala Cheese Sandwich
description: A flavorful blend of aromatic masala and melted cheese between slices of bread, creating a scrumptious masala cheese sandwich.

name: Pizza Sandwich
description: A delightful combination of pizza toppings sandwiched between layers of bread, forming a mouthwatering pizza sandwich.

name: Corn Cheese Sandwich
description: A delectable harmony of creamy cheese and golden corn kernels nestled within slices of bread, crafting a savory corn cheese sandwich.

name: Paneer Cheese Sandwich
description: A delectable fusion of velvety paneer and gooey cheese, perfectly embraced by slices of bread in a paneer cheese sandwich.

name: Plain Maggie
description: A comforting bowl of classic instant noodles, simplicity at its finest, known as plain Maggi.

name: Masala Maggie
description: A flavorful bowl of instant noodles infused with aromatic spices, transforming into masala Maggi.

name: Veg Maggie
description: A savory bowl of instant noodles enhanced with an assortment of colorful vegetables, creating a delightful veg Maggi.

name: Veg Butter Masala Maggie
description: A delectable blend of buttery richness and savory vegetables, elevating the taste of classic instant noodles in veg butter Maggi.

name: Veg Corn Maggie
description: A delightful combination of tender corn kernels and assorted vegetables infused into classic instant noodles, presenting veg corn Maggi.

name: Masala Cheese Maggie
description: A savory symphony of aromatic spices and melted cheese enveloping the beloved instant noodles, creating masala cheese Maggi.

name: Cheese Corn Maggie
description: A delectable fusion of creamy cheese and golden corn kernels enhancing the beloved instant noodles, giving rise to cheese corn Maggi.

name: Paneer Cheese Maggie
description: A delectable harmony of velvety paneer and gooey cheese elevating the beloved instant noodles, resulting in paneer cheese Maggi.

name: Lemon Rice
description: A zesty and tangy South Indian dish made by mixing cooked rice with lemon juice and spices, known as lemon rice.

name: Fried Rice
description: A flavorful Asian dish created by stir-frying cooked rice with assorted vegetables, proteins, and seasonings, resulting in fried rice.

name: Schezwan Rice
description: A spicy and flavorful Chinese-inspired rice dish infused with Szechuan sauce and ingredients, known as Schezwan rice.

name: Green Peas Rice
description: A wholesome and aromatic dish prepared by combining cooked rice with tender green peas, creating green peas rice.

name: Veg Biryani
description: A fragrant and flavorful Indian rice dish cooked with a medley of vegetables and aromatic spices, presenting veg biryani.

name: Paneer Fried Rice
description: A delightful fusion of tender paneer cubes and flavorful rice, stir-fried with vegetables and seasonings, resulting in paneer fried rice.

name: Noodles
description: Long, thin strands of dough made from wheat or rice flour, often cooked and served in various savory dishes, known as noodles.

name: Schezwan Noodles
description: A spicy and savory Chinese-inspired dish featuring noodles tossed with Szechuan sauce and ingredients, creating Schezwan noodles.

name: Veg Loaded Noodles
description: Noodles generously packed with an assortment of flavorful vegetables, resulting in a satisfying and veg-loaded dish.

name: White Cream Noodles
description: Noodles coated in a rich and creamy white sauce, creating a delectable dish known as white cream noodles.

name: Hakka Noodles
description: A delicious Chinese stir-fried noodle dish, originating from the Hakka region, known as hakka noodles.

name: Angar Noodles
description: A fiery and spicy version of noodles, named 'angar noodles,' infused with bold flavors and heat.
